https://src.fedoraproject.org/rpms/uv/pull-request/12

 Problem 1: nothing provides requested (crate(async-channel/default) >= 2.3.1 with crate(async-channel/default) < 3.0.0~)
 Problem 2: nothing provides requested (crate(async-compression/bzip2) >= 0.4.12 with crate(async-compression/bzip2) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 3: nothing provides requested (crate(async-compression/default) >= 0.4.12 with crate(async-compression/default) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 4: nothing provides requested (crate(async-compression/gzip) >= 0.4.12 with crate(async-compression/gzip) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 5: nothing provides requested (crate(async-compression/xz) >= 0.4.12 with crate(async-compression/xz) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 6: nothing provides requested (crate(async-compression/zstd) >= 0.4.12 with crate(async-compression/zstd) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 7: nothing provides requested (crate(bytecheck/default) >= 0.8.0 with crate(bytecheck/default) < 0.9.0~)
 Problem 8: nothing provides requested (crate(dashmap/default) >= 6.1.0 with crate(dashmap/default) < 7.0.0~)
 Problem 9: nothing provides requested (crate(flate2) >= 1.0.33 with crate(flate2) < 2.0.0~)
 Problem 10: nothing provides requested (crate(flate2/zlib-ng) >= 1.0.33 with crate(flate2/zlib-ng) < 2.0.0~)
 Problem 11: nothing provides requested (crate(ignore/default) >= 0.4.23 with crate(ignore/default) < 0.5.0~)
 Problem 12: nothing provides requested (crate(owo-colors/default) >= 4.1.0 with crate(owo-colors/default) < 5.0.0~)
 Problem 13: nothing provides requested (crate(petgraph/default) >= 0.6.5 with crate(petgraph/default) < 0.7.0~)
 Problem 14: nothing provides requested (crate(rkyv/bytecheck) >= 0.8.8 with crate(rkyv/bytecheck) < 0.9.0~)

notes:
Update `rust-brotli-decompressor` to 4.0.1, `rust-brotli` to 7.0.0, and `rust-async-compression` to 0.4.13. Patch dependent packages as needed to avoid compat packages.

----

Rebuild with the latest Rust crate dependency versions; fix automatic provides on Python extension due to SONAME when built with Rust 1.81 or later.
